---
title: Pricing
description: Simple usage-based pricing with included hours on every plan
---

## Usage Costs

<CardGroup cols={3}>
  <Card title="Browser Usage" icon="tv">
    **$0.05 / hour**

    Charged per minute, rounded up.
  </Card>
  <Card title="Proxy Usage" icon="globe">
    **$10 / GB**

    Premium residential proxies.
  </Card>
  <Card title="LLM Usage" icon="microchip-ai">
    **Pay token price**

    No markup â€” pay exactly what you use.
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

## Plans

<Tabs>
  <Tab title="Free">
    ### Free - $0

    Great for trying Notte and small personal projects.

    | Included | Value |
    |----------|-------|
    | Browser hours | 100 forever |
    | Concurrency | 5 browsers |
  </Tab>
  <Tab title="Developer">
    ### Developer - $20/mo + usage

    Affordable entry with included hours and proxy.

    | Included | Value |
    |----------|-------|
    | Browser hours | 100/mo |
    | Concurrency | 25 browsers |
    | Stealth | Basic |
  </Tab>
  <Tab title="Startup">
    ### Startup - $100/mo + usage

    Scale your agents with higher limits and features.

    | Included | Value |
    |----------|-------|
    | Browser hours | 500/mo |
    | Concurrency | 100 browsers |
    | Stealth | Advanced |
    | BYO | Keys & Proxies |
  </Tab>
  <Tab title="Enterprise">
    ### Enterprise - Custom

    Custom limits, SSO, SLAs and dedicated support.

    | Included | Value |
    |----------|-------|
    | Browser hours | Usage-based |
    | Concurrency | 250+ browsers |
    | Stealth | Advanced+ |
    | BYO | Keys, Proxies, Cloud |
    | Compliance | SSO, SLAs, HIPAA |
  </Tab>
</Tabs>

## Add-ons

| Add-on | Price |
|--------|-------|
| Credit Packs | $100 / $200 / $500 - lifetime credits that don't expire |
| Fixed IPs | [Contact us](https://cal.com/team/notte/demo) |
